channel.description: Recent content in VS Code on Eman's Blog

item.title: VS Code Key Bindings for Multi-line Editing
item.description: Shortcut Keys Description Alt+Click Insert cursor Ctrl+Alt+↑/↓ Insert cursor above/ below Ctrl+U Undo last cursor operation Shift+Alt+I Insert cursor at end of each line selected Ctrl+L Select current line Ctrl+Shift+L Select all occurrences of current selection Ctrl+F2 Select all occurrences of current word Shift+Alt+→ Expand selection Shift+Alt+← Shrink selection Shift+Alt+(drag mouse) Column (box) selection Ctrl+Shift+Alt+(arrow key) Column (box) selection Ctrl+Shift+Alt+PgUp/PgDn Column(box)selection page up/down
